name: BackTrack (itch) (Sigma)
description:
BACKTRACK

This game was created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

BackTrack is a simple concept and puzzle game. You control a Red Cube which can activate plates to open the door. The main game mechanic is the Rewind which spawns a ghost of the cube which backtrack the original cube with fixed time.

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Rewind

Credits:

Creator - Sigma

Music - Third Eye

3D Art Assets - Kenny Nature Kit
